title: President Donald J. Trump Is Protecting Our Suburbs and Preserving the American Dream for All Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
July 23, 2020
The suburb destruction will end with us.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROTECTING AMERICAN COMMUNITIES: President Donald J. Trump is protecting American communities from excessive Federal overreach and preserving local decision-making.SAVING OUR SUBURBS: This action ends the Federal encroachment on local communities that threatened our nation’s suburbs.UNLEASHING REGULATORY RELIEF: Through this action, President Trump is building upon his historic reversal of the Obama Administration’s disastrous regulatory policies.
